add_portrait;Forde;MidRight
expression;Forde;HalfCloseEyes
bop_portrait;Forde
speak;Forde;*yawn*|Another night, another nightmare...|I can barely keep my eyes open...
add_portrait;Lute;MidLeft
speak;Lute;Fascinating.|Your energy signature is most unusual today, Forde.
expression;Forde;NormalBlink
speak;Forde;Huh?|Oh, hello Lute.|What's unusual about my...whatever you said?
speak;Lute;Your energy signature.|The magical aura that surrounds all living beings.|Yours is fluctuating in a most peculiar pattern.
speak;Forde;Is that your way of saying I look tired?|Because I am.|These dreams won't let me sleep.
speak;Lute;Dreams?|Tell me about these dreams.|Be specific. The details matter.
speak;Forde;They're always the same.|I'm in a dark room...|There are whispers I can't quite understand...
speak;Lute;Go on.
speak;Forde;And there's this...feeling.|Like something's pulling at me.|Not physically, but... deeper.
expression;Lute;Smile
bop_portrait;Lute
speak;Lute;Just as I suspected!|Your symptoms align perfectly with nascent magical resonance.|Specifically, dark magic resonance.
expression;Forde;NoSmile
speak;Forde;Dark magic?|But I'm a cavalier!|I don't have any magical ability!
speak;Lute;Incorrect.|Everyone has some magical potential.|Most never discover it.
speak;Forde;So you're saying...|I have dark magic inside me?|That's what's causing these dreams?
speak;Lute;Not just inside you.|You have an affinity for it.|Quite a strong one, I'd say.
speak;Forde;Is that...bad?|Am I cursed or something?

speak;Lute;Dark magic is neither good nor evil.|It's a tool, like any other magic.|The perpetual fatigue you experience is likely your body's attempt to conserve energy that's being drained by untapped magical potential.
speak;Forde;Wait...|Are you saying that's why I'm always tired?|Not because I'm lazy?
speak;Lute;Precisely.|Your body is constantly fighting against uncontrolled magical leakage.|It's quite inefficient.
add_portrait;Kyle;FarRight
speak;Kyle;Forde?|Are you actually awake before noon?|This must be recorded in the annals of history.
expression;Forde;HalfCloseEyes
speak;Forde;Very funny, Kyle.|Lute here says I have dark magic abilities.|That's why I'm always tired.
speak;Kyle;Dark magic?|You?|That's ridiculous.
expression;Lute;NoSmile
speak;Lute;I don't make errors in magical assessment, Sir Kyle.|Forde exhibits all the classic signs of untrained magical potential.|His constant fatigue is merely a symptom.
speak;Kyle;So you're saying all these years...|He wasn't just being lazy?
speak;Lute;Correct.|Though his chosen coping mechanisms may have been suboptimal.
remove_portrait;Kyle
speak;Forde;So what do I do about it, Lute?|I don't want these nightmares anymore.|And I'd like to actually feel rested for once.
expression;Lute;NormalBlink
speak;Lute;You have two options.|First, you could learn to suppress it.|But that would only lead to greater fatigue over time.
speak;Forde;And the second option?
expression;Lute;Smile
speak;Lute;Learn to channel it.|Learn to control the dark magic within you.|Use it rather than let it use you.
expression;Forde;NoSmile
speak;Forde;Me?|Learning magic?|I can barely stay awake during sword practice!
speak;Lute;The alternative is continued nightmares and fatigue.|Eventually, it could manifest in more... problematic ways.
bop_portrait;Forde
speak;Forde;What do you mean by 'problematic'?
speak;Lute;Uncontrolled magical discharge.|Spontaneous shadow manifestations.|Possibly even attracting creatures from the void.
speak;Forde;That sounds...|Extremely bad.|You're serious about all this, aren't you?
expression;Lute;NoSmile
speak;Lute;I'm always serious about magical phenomena.|It's my area of expertise.|I could... help you, if you wish.
expression;Forde;NormalBlink
speak;Forde;You'd do that?|I thought you were busy with your own studies.
speak;Lute;This is a rare opportunity to observe dark magic affinity development in real-time.|It would be academically irresponsible to pass it up.
expression;Forde;Smile
speak;Forde;That's Lute-speak for "I want to help," isn't it?
speak;Lute;I...|simply recognize the potential research value.|And the tactical advantage of having another magic user in our ranks.|Even for one so...unusual...
speak;Forde;Well, I've always been unusual.|So, what now?|Do I have to give up being a cavalier?|Learn to use magic through my sword or something?
expression;Lute;Smile
bop_portrait;Lute
speak;Lute;Yes!|Precisely what I was thinking!|A fascinating case study in magical adaptation!
speak;Forde;So I could...|Use magic and still fight with Kyle and the others?
speak;Lute;With proper training, yes.|It won't be easy.|But it would resolve your nightmares.
expression;Forde;NormalBlink
bop_portrait;Forde
speak;Forde;Then I'll do it.|No more nightmares.|No more unexplained exhaustion.
speak;Lute;Excellent.|We'll begin tomorrow at dawn.|The magical energies are strongest then.
expression;Forde;NoSmile
speak;Forde;Dawn?|Can't we start at... noon?|Or later?
bop_portrait;Lute
expression;Lute;Smile
speak;Lute;Old habits die hard, I see.|Very well. Mid-morning.|But not a moment later.
expression;Forde;Smile
speak;Forde;Thank you, Lute.|I never thought my constant sleepiness had a cause.|I just thought I was... you know... lazy.
speak;Lute;There's often a rational explanation for seemingly irrational behaviors.|Your body was conserving energy.|Now we'll teach it a better way.
bop_portrait;Forde
expression;Forde;Smile
speak;Forde;I can't wait to see Kyle's face when I cast my first spell.|He'll never believe it.
speak;Lute;I suggest we keep this between us for now.|Until you have better control.|Dark magic can be... unpredictable.
speak;Forde;Right.|Our secret then.|Until I can show off properly.
expression;Lute;Smile
bop_portrait;Lute
speak;Lute;Mid-morning tomorrow.|Don't be late.|We have much to discover about your abilities.
speak;Forde;I'll be there.|For once in my life, I'm actually looking forward to training!
